name: RetroCat
description: RetroCat is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its classic box body, equipped with retroConsole buttons and cat-like arms and legs, RetroCat brings a unique combination of nostalgia and cuteness. Its red and black screen adds a touch of vintage charm to its appearance. RetroCat is a versatile robot, capable of capturing and displaying waveforms with precision. It is a beloved member of the WebtrES club, known for its reliability and charming personality.
